text: Margarita Carrera Molina (16 September 1929 – 31 March 2018) was a Guatemalan philosopher, professor and writer. She was a member of the Academia Guatemalteca de la Lengua and the 1996 laureate of the Miguel Ángel Asturias National Prize in Literature. She was born in Guatemala City. Carrera died in Guatemala City on 31 March 2018 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Philosophers Category:Academics Category:Guatemalan writers Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Margarita Carrera
